name: Cosmic Garden
description:
Fill the galaxy with life in this chill simulation game. There is no end, although there is eventually a cap on planets.
Plants will grow better on planets that closely match their temperature and moisture preference. It costs awe to place a plant onto a planet, but planets produce awe when an individual plants become fully grown. The growth rate (lower number being faster) and awe produced per plant are shown on the plant info panel. 
Newly spawned worlds may have spawned off screen, you can look for them by moving the camera with wasd.
Created for Kenney Game Jam 2022 - Growth

All art assets and sound effects by Kenney. Primarily relying on Planets and Foliage
Background Music - Observing the Star by Yd
